nodes.text: The YT-2400BT freighter was a variant of the YT-2400 light freighter. At least one such freighter flew with the Citizens' fleet during the Battle of Exegol against the Sith Eternal forces.

A YT-2400 BT freighter appeared in the 2019 sequel trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode IX The Rise of Skywalker. The vehicle was first identified in the 2020 video "Every Ship in the Star Wars Sequel Trilogy" which was released as part of the Star Wars By the Numbers series on the StarWarsKids.com YouTube channel.
